name: xraytsubaki
description: xraytsubaki is a Rust-based program that implements the core functionalities of [xraylarch](https://xraypy.github.io/xraylarch/). The primary aim of this project is to expedite the processing of extensive XAS data sets. The project's name, xraytsubaki, draws inspiration from [tsubaki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Camellia_japonica).
